WindowCut_event.summary: The cut event is fired when the user has initiated a "cut" action through the browser's user interface.

remarks.para: The original target for this event is the that was the intended target of the cut action. You can listen for this event on the interface to handle it in the capture or bubbling phases. For full details on this event please see the page on the Element: cut event.
